argument.name: P
argument.description: A pointer variable containing information about a computer's battery.

argument.name: computer
argument.description: Optional. Default = "." (local computer). The name of the computer to analyze.

page.description: Retrieve information about the computer's battery
page.discussion: The WIN_BATTERY_INFO() function retrieve information about the computer's battery. Limitations: This function does not work with Windows 98 and Windows ME.
page.example: ? WIN_BATTERY_INFO() = Availability = 3 BatteryRechargeTime = BatteryStatus = 3 Caption = "Internal Battery" Chemistry = ...
